Projects.name: Universe Energy Inc.
Projects.problem: Batteries are challenging to reuse due to expensive shipping, non-standard testing, and dangerous disassembly.
Projects.solution: Ship used batteries, automate testing and dismantling using machine learning and robotics, repurpose for grid storage or raw materials, reduce CO2e emissions.

Projects.name: Urbyn
Projects.problem: Sustainable management of business waste throughout France.
Projects.solution: Analyze waste production, find recovery solutions through a network of service providers, provide sorting system, assist in waste collection, offer operational support and optimization.

Projects.name: RAIKU
Projects.solution: Introduce RAIKU, a natural and compostable alternative to plastic bubble wrap and packaging filling, with lower environmental footprint.

Projects.name: sensand
Projects.problem: Collect and collate data for carbon credit creation and crop optimization.
Projects.solution: Provide a digital agriculture ecosystem, integrate smart farming technologies, transparent carbon credit trading, and MRV land management platform.

Projects.name: Allye
Projects.problem: Enable businesses and homes to access cheaper, cleaner energy.
Projects.solution: Offer distributed energy storage using smart battery technology, partner with electricity networks, optimize energy usage through machine learning and AI.

Projects.name: dClimate
Projects.problem: Facilitate seamless data exchange and collaboration in climate technology.
Projects.solution: Create a transparent, decentralized marketplace for standardized and monetized climate data, connecting data providers with consumers.

Projects.name: Forum for African Women Educationalists
Projects.problem: Ensure quality education and equal opportunities for Kenyan girls.
Projects.solution: Work with Ministries of Education, utilize existing institutions and structures, promote ownership, and address various aspects of girls' education.
